effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
